data.content:
# Phase 3 Audit Remediation - Bug Fixes

## Bugs Fixed

### module.py - Wrong variable names and missing validation
- **Bug**: `add_instances` list path used `instances.name` (the whole list) instead of `instance.name` (the iterator) at lines 215 and 220
- **Added**: Duplicate port name verification in `add_ports`
- **Added**: Duplicate parameter name verification in `add_parameters`

### sim/hdl.py - Crash bugs
- **Bug**: `assigned_globals.append(target, infer_register)` — `list.append` only takes 1 arg; would crash when `manual_visit=True`
- **Bug**: `func.id` accessed without type guard after `isinstance(func, ast.Attribute)` check; would crash for non-Name, non-Attribute func types

### vcd/__init__.py - Python convention violation
- `VCDScope.__eq__` raised `TypeError` for non-VCDScope comparisons; now returns `NotImplemented` per Python data model

### vcd/compiler.py - Uninitialized variables and debug prints
- `record_state` now handles None, 'x', 'z' values instead of crashing on `int(state, 2)`
- Removed `print("DEBUG: starting")` and `print(f"DEBUG: @{time}")` from production code
- Removed empty `_item_size` method

### vcd/tracker.py - Anchor validation and logic cleanup
- Added validation: anchors now require scope restriction to be set
- Simplified duplicated source-tracking logic into single conditional

### vcd/parser.py - Debug print
- Removed `print(f"DEBUG: @{time}")` from `clock_change_handler`

## Test Results
122 passed, 3 skipped, 0 failed
data.context: Phase 3 audit remediation - actual bug fixes and code quality improvements
data.title: Phase 3 Audit Remediation - Bug Fixes
